title: Big Cats Quiz
description: Test your knowledge of lions, tigers, leopards, and other magnificent big cats

questions.question: Which big cat is the largest in the world, with males weighing up to 660 pounds?
Which is the only big cat that lives in social groups called prides?
Which big cat is the fastest land animal, capable of reaching speeds up to 70 mph?
Which big cat is known for dragging its prey up into trees to keep it safe from scavengers?
Which big cat has the strongest bite force relative to its size and can crush turtle shells and caiman skulls?
What is a black panther actually? It is a melanistic (black-coated) variant of which cats?
Which big cat is found only in the Americas and is the third-largest cat in the world?
Which big cat cannot fully retract its claws, an adaptation that helps it grip the ground while sprinting?
Which subspecies of tiger is the most numerous in the wild today?
Which big cat purrs but cannot roar, despite being classified alongside lions and tigers?
What are the distinctive black lines running from a cheetah's eyes to its mouth called?
Which big cat's spots are called 'rosettes' because they are shaped like roses?
In which continent would you find wild lions today (outside of a small population in India)?
Which big cat has stripes that are unique to each individual, much like human fingerprints?
What is a hybrid offspring of a male lion and a female tiger called?
